availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Christian Gastreich (Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, tailor)

body.p: Covington, Kenton County, Kentucky, tailor. Native of Germany. Married Elizabeth Gastreich. Father of Henry Gastreich, Christianna Gastreich, Frederick Gastreich, Joseph Gastreich. Tailor in Covington, Kenton County, in 1850.Tailor in Covington, Kenton County, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 6, p. 315B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1, p. 561.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1, p. 61.
Find A Grave, "Christian Gastreich (1826-1897)," Memorial #97136206, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/97136206 (accessed March 29, 2019).
